alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:37AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Erie and northern Crawford Counties through 845 AM EDT... At 736 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm with possible rotation 7 miles northeast of Harmonsburg, or 10 miles northwest of Meadville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph with possible rotation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Corry, Edinboro, Titusville, Union City, Cambridge Springs, Riceville, Lincolnville, Canadohta Lake, Harmonsburg, Saegertown, Hydetown, Mill Village, Blooming Valley, Townville, Spartansburg, Venango, Elgin and Woodcock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
